膎字的基本解释

膎
xié
干肉：“是时城中围逼既久，膎味顿绝。”
肉食：“脯腊膎胰以供滋膳。”
熟食：“多田不娄，费我膎功。”

膎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
［《廣韻》户佳切，平佳，匣。］
干肉；熟食。

膎字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膎； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页991第29
【唐韻】戸皆切【集韻】戸佳切【韻會】戸加切【正韻】雄皆切，?音鮭。【說文】脯也。【徐曰】古謂脯之屬爲膎，因通謂儲蓄食味爲膎。【廣韻】肉食肴也。【集韻】一曰吳人謂腌魚爲膎脼。【韻會】南史，孔靖飮宋高祖，酒無膎，取伏雞卵爲肴。王儉云：庾郞食膎，有二十七種。　又凡熟食皆曰膎。【揚子·太?經】多田不婁，費我膎功。【註】熟食曰膎。　又肌膚亦曰膎。【博雅】肌膚者，膎也。　又【韻會】通作鮭。【世說新語】庾杲食膎。作食鮭。【杜甫詩】自愧無鮭菜。

膎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
膎字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Scum
xié
Dried meat: "It's time when the city has been around for a long time, and the smell is absolutely delicious."
Meat: "Put the pancreas with preserved meat for nourishment."
Cooked food: "Tada is not loud, it takes my work."

[①]［xié］
["Guang Yun" Hu Jiaqie, Ping Jia, Xie. ]
Dried meat; cooked food.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Meat Character Department] 　膎; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 991 29
[Tang Yun] All cut [Ji Yun] No Jia cut [Rhyme] No plus cut [Positive rhyme] Both male cut, sound salmon. [Said the text] Can also. [Xu Yue] In ancient times, the genus of preserved candied fruit was called mutton, because it was commonly said that the taste of saving was mutton. [Guangyun] Meat dishes are also available. [Jiyun] Yi said that the people of Wu said that pickled fish is mutton. [Rhyme Society] Southern History, Kong Jingsang Song Gaozu, wine without smut, take chicken eggs as a delicacy. Wang Jianyun: There are twenty-seven kinds of food from Yu Yan.　Every cooked food is called mutton. 【Yangtze·Tai? Jing】Tada is not loud, it takes my work. [Note] Cooked food is called mutton.　The skin is also said to be fat. 【Liberal Arts】Those with skin, sputum.　[Rhyme Club] is also known as salmon. [Shi Shuo Xin Yu] Yu Gao's food. Eat salmon. [Du Fu Poetry] I am ashamed of no salmon dishes.
